person.persName: Edward T. Clarkson (Covington trader and pork packer)

body.p: Covington trader and pork packer. Kentucky native. Father of Edward Clarkson, James Clarkson, and George Clarkson. Kenton County Justice of the Peace in 1847.

bibl.p: “Maj Edward Trabue Clarkson,” Find A Grave, January 15, 2007, memorial no. 17466848. Taliaferro P. Shaffner, ed., The Kentucky State Register, for the Year 1847 (Louisville, KY: Morton and Griswold, 1847), p. 113. Williams’ Cincinnati Directory, City Guide and Business Mirror, for 1860. Together with Directories of the Cities of Covington and Newport, KY., and a List of the Post Offices in the U.S. and Territories, arranged in States and Counties (Cincinnati, OH: C. S. Williams, 1860), p. 334. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 143.
